name: PhysicsMaterialResource
desc: Material properties, like friction, of a physically simulated object.

items.name: static func generate(friction: Float, restitution: Float) -> PhysicsMaterialResource
items.desc: Generates a new material with the given characteristics.

items.name: static func generate(staticFriction: Float, dynamicFriction: Float, restitution: Float) -> PhysicsMaterialResource
